ch.nolix.interfaces.controller

Interface IBidirectionalController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IController, IControlleroid, Stoppable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalBidirectionalController, NetBidirectionalController

    public interface IBidirectionalController
extends IController, Stoppable
    A duplex controller is a controller that can lead received commands and requests to its receiver controller.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface ch.nolix.interfaces.controller.IController

        REQUEST_IS_NOT_VALID

        void runAppendedCommands()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Runs and removes the appended commands of this duplex controller.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if this duplex controller is stopped or an error occurs by running of one of the appended commands
